work.name: Cdiscount
work.summary:
My mission consisted in providing data driven solutions for Cdiscount intern services in a short period of time. Missions achieved : 
â€¢ Massive customer clustering (Cdiscount Voyage)
â€¢ Bot detection (pattern analysis)
â€¢ Sentiment analysis (Natural Langage Processing)
â€¢ Object detection in picture (Mask-RCNN, yoloV3)

work.name: Cdiscount
work.summary:
As a Data Scientist working in the Search Engine Team, I was involved in the development and deployment  of machine learning algorithms and data analysis applied to (at least):
â€¢ Search engine relevance
â€¢ Recommendation engine
â€¢ Algorithms evaluation (A/B testing)
â€¢ Focus on website's KPI improvment
â€¢ Python development (Scikit-learn, Numpy, Scipy, Pandas, Luigi etc)
â€¢ Hadoop Hive & SQL Databases

work.name: Cdiscount
work.summary:
Machine learning implementation and statistical analysis used to improv the relevence of the Cdiscount.com search engine.
â€¢ Marketing targeting :
behavioral analysis and improvment of the search engine relevence through AB test, proof of concept personnalisation client (classification and clustering)
â€¢ Geographical data :
Purchase forecasting by geographic zone
Statistical analysis : data enrichment with INSEE database, implementation and developement of geocoding tool
â€¢ Intern innovation contest :
Setting of a new operationnal service for the client : forcasting system of product storage to allow express delivery

references.name: Bertrand Warot, Data Science Manager @Betclic-Group
references.reference:
Thomas is a gem!

I have had the pleasure to manage and work with him on several projects.
His a fast learner and adapted quickly to the specificities of our industry. His deep scientific knowledge along with his coding skills are his strongest assets (and two of the most important skills for a data scientist). I also have been amazed by the creative approaches he has to rather common issues, always willing to test new ideas, which paid most of the time.

He is definitely passionate about Data Science and Mathematics, and loves to share his knowledge and make it accessible to everyone.

I would be glad to have the occasion to work with him again in the future!
